modal.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
modal.description: An error occurred while connecting to the server. Please try again later.

401.title: Oops! Unauthorized!
401.description: It looks like you do not have access to the requested page. Try logging in with another account.

403.title: Oops! Forbidden!
403.description: It looks like you do not have access to the requested page. Try logging in with another account.

404.title: Oops! Page not found!
404.description: It looks like the page you're looking for doesn't exist or it is not available.

500.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
500.description: We are sorry for the inconvenience. There was an unexpected error. Please try again later.

api.title: Oops! Something went wrong!
api.description: The API is not responding. Check your internet connection or try again later.

restaurants.no_results: No results for the given query

login.reset_password_email_sent: We have sent you an email with a link to reset your password.
login.mailer_error: There was an error while sending the email. Please try again later.
login.request_error: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.
login.reset_password_error: There was an error while resetting your password. Please try again later.
login.login_error: There was an error while logging in. Please check your credentials. If you haven't activated your account, check your inbox.
login.register_success: We have sent you an email with a link to verify your account. Check your inbox!
login.verify_error: There was a problem activating your account. Check your inbox for a new verification URL and try again later.
